name: PickPros
description: Pick Pros is a lock picking mini game made with Unity. While in itself fun it is designed to be included in a larger scale game as a barrier for entering limited areas or chests. Different difficulties and player levels can be selected at the main menu to simulate different stages in a game where a player maybe required to pick a lock. A higher player level increases the "sweet spot" area that will unlock the lock. Higher difficulties decreases the "sweet spot" area making it more difficult to unlock a lock.
